bastion.description: Test VM in Bastion subnet to generate flow logs

security.description: Test VM in Security subnet to generate flow logs

o11y.description: Test VM in O11y subnet to generate flow logs

vmConfiguration.deployVMs: Set to true to deploy test VMs in subnets (generates flow logs)
vmConfiguration.vmSize: VM size - Standard_B1s is cheapest (~$7.59/month, 1 vCPU, 1GB RAM)
vmConfiguration.sshPublicKey: SSH public key (required if authenticationType is 'sshPublicKey')

vmDeployment.deploy: Set to true to deploy VM in this subnet
vmDeployment.vmName: Name for the VM (will be prefixed with baseObjectName)
vmDeployment.enablePublicIP: Set to true to create a public IP for the VM (increases cost)
vmDeployment.description: Human-readable description of the VM's purpose

pricing.Standard_B1ls: $3.80/month (1 vCPU, 0.5GB RAM) - Ultra cheap but limited
pricing.note: Prices are approximate for East US region. Stop VMs when not needed to save costs.

security.password: Password will be prompted during deployment (not stored in file)
security.recommendation: Use SSH keys for production, passwords for quick testing

costSaving.tip1: Stop VMs when not needed: az vm deallocate --resource-group <rg> --name <vm-name>
costSaving.tip3: Delete VMs after testing: Set deployVMs to false and re-run
costSaving.tip4: Use Standard_B1ls for absolute minimum cost ($3.80/month)
